entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
